channel.title: community on PyLadies Grand Rapids
channel.description: Recent content in community on PyLadies Grand Rapids

item.title: PyLadies hosts Django Girls Grand Rapids 2019 Workshop
item.description: Numbers We hosted our third Django Girls workshop on April 12th - 13th at The Source. 34 attendees 11 sponsors 12 coaches 5 organizers a ton of supportive friends = An Awesome Workshop Coffee, Code, Repeat Because our workshop from the previous years were such a success we did a lot of the same things for this year. You can read more about that here. Pita House catered our lunch again this year, and again they didn’t disappoint.

item.title: PyLadies hosts Django Girls Grand Rapids 2018 Workshop
item.description: Numbers After a very successful first workshop in 2017, we decided to put on another Django Girls workshop on March 9th - 10th at Start Garden: 34 attendees 16 sponsors 14 coaches 6 organizers a ton of supportive friends = An Awesome Workshop Coffee, Code, Repeat Because our workshop from the previous year was such a success we did a lot of the same things for this year.
